Episodes.Title: The Best Man
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: While Barney prepares for his wedding to a mystery bride, he and Ted reminisce about Punchy's wedding, including when Marshall and Lily announced they were having a baby. Meanwhile, Robin considers telling Barney she has feelings ...

Episodes.Title: The Naked Truth
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Stephen Lloyd
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted tries to choose a date for the Architect's Ball, an embarrassing Internet video could cost Marshall a new job, and Barney makes a bold move to prove to Nora that he's a changed man.

Episodes.Title: Ducky Tie
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: At the Architect's Ball, Ted runs into Victoria, who tells him that she's getting married. Meanwhile, Barney places an unlikely wager with Marshall and Lily in order to see Lily's breasts.

Episodes.Title: The Stinson Missile Crisis
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Jealous over Barney's relationship with Nora, Robin tells her court-appointed therapist the series of events that led up to the assault that she committed.

Episodes.Title: Field Trip
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jamie Rhonheimer
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Robin tries to date her therapist, Marshall thinks his boss has gone soft on environmentalism, Barney suspects that Nora may be lying about her age, and Ted takes his Intro to Architecture class on the worst field trip ever.

Episodes.Title: Mystery vs. History
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chuck Tatham
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted agrees to go on a date without researching her on the Internet beforehand; Barney urges Marshall and Lily to find out and reveal the gender of their child; and Kevin tries but fails to avoid passing judgment on the group.

Episodes.Title: Noretta
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Matt Kuhn
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Kevin's declaration that everybody marries their parents ruins Marshall and Lily's romantic evening, but will anything keep Barney from getting lucky with Nora? And will Kevin finally get fed up with Ted and Robin's close relation...

Episodes.Title: The Slutty Pumpkin Returns
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Tami Sagher
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted finds his long-lost crush from a Halloween party 10 years ago, but will there be any chemistry? Meanwhile, Lily's "pregnancy brain" convinces her to move to the suburbs, and Barney finds out he's one-quarter Canadian.

Episodes.Title: Disaster Averted
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: The gang explains to Kevin the origins of the "No Boogie-Boarding" sign in front of MacLaren's, which has to do with Hurricane Irene. Meanwhile, Barney negotiates with Marshall about how to get out of wearing the ducky tie.

Episodes.Title: Tick Tick Tick
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chris Harris
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney and Robin are afraid to break the news to Nora and Kevin that they cheated with each other and want to get back together, while Ted and Marshall get stoned together at a concert.

Episodes.Title: The Rebound Girl
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: While Robin tries to talk Marshall and Lily out of moving to Long Island, Ted and Barney make the decision to become "bro-parents."

Episodes.Title: Symphony of Illumination
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: After Robin tells Barney that she's pregnant with his child, she receives some shocking news from her doctor. Meanwhile, a neighborhood teen plays a trick on Marshall while he decorates his house with Christmas lights.

Episodes.Title: Tailgate
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: After celebrating New Year's Eve, Marshall visits his father's graveside to carry on their tradition of tailgating. Meanwhile, Barney and Ted open a bar called "Puzzles," and Robin is forced to fill in for an inebriated news anchor.

Episodes.Title: 46 Minutes
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Dan Gregor
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: While Marshall and Lily spend their first night in their new home after deciding to permanently move to Long Island, Barney takes over as group leader in Manhattan--both with disastrous results.

Episodes.Title: The Burning Beekeeper
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Lily and Marshall throw a housewarming party where Ted nearly comes to blows with Marshall's boss; Barney hits on a crazy divorcee.

Episodes.Title: The Drunk Train
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Kevin proposes to Robin, but will he take it back when Robin tells him she can't have children? Meanwhile, Barney and Ted try to score on the "drunk train" to Long Island, but something is surprisingly holding Barney back.

Episodes.Title: No Pressure
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, George Sloan
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: While Ted waits to find out whether Robin loves him back, he discovers that Marshall and Lily have been trying to influence him in opposite directions to win a bet. Meanwhile, Barney tries to find Marshall and Lily's sex tape.

Episodes.Title: Karma
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Stephen Lloyd
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney gets played and heart-broken over a stripper named "Karma," Robin becomes bored with her life on Long Island with Marshall and Lily, while Ted searches for a hobby to fill the empty space in Robin's old room.

Episodes.Title: The Broath
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: The gang tries to break up Barney and Quinn after learning they plan on moving in together, leaving Robin and Ted to fight over who deserves to sublet her apartment.

Episodes.Title: Trilogy Time
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: As Ted, Marshall, and Barney get together for their triennial viewing of the original Star Wars trilogy, Ted begins to question if he will ever end up where he wants to be - especially now that Barney and Quinn are getting serious.

Episodes.Title: Now We're Even
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chuck Tatham
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Just as Ted starts to settle into his new apartment alone, Barney tries to entice him into going out every single night. Meanwhile, Lily has a naughty dream about someone other than Marshall, and Robin finally becomes a famous new...

Episodes.Title: Good Crazy
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney tries to set Ted up on dates so that he can forget about Robin, while also plotting to get Quinn out of her stripping job. Meanwhile, Lily sends Marshall on a getaway so that he will stop stressing over the baby.

Episodes.Title: The Magician's Code: Part 1
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jenni Hendriks
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted and Robin take care of Lily when she goes into labor because Marshall is drunk and stuck in Atlantic City with Barney.

Episodes.Title: The Magician's Code: Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted makes a fateful phone call to his old girlfriend Victoria, Barney's magic trick gets him in trouble with airport security just as he's about to leave on a trip with Quinn, and Robin tries to take the perfect birth announcement...
